question.spanish: ¿Cuándo celebra la República Dominicana su Día de la Independencia?
question.english: When does the Dominican Republic celebrate its Independence Day?

question.spanish: ¿Cuál es la capital de la República Dominicana?
question.english: What is the capital of the Dominican Republic?

question.spanish: ¿Cuántas provincias tiene la República Dominicana?
question.english: How many provinces does the Dominican Republic have?

question.spanish: ¿De qué país se independizó la República Dominicana?
question.english: From what country did the Dominican Republic gain independence?

question.spanish: ¿Cuáles son los tres poderes del Estado dominicano?
question.english: What are the three branches of the Dominican State?

question.spanish: ¿Cuál es la moneda oficial de la República Dominicana?
question.english: What is the official currency of the Dominican Republic?

question.spanish: ¿Qué colores tiene la bandera de la República Dominicana?
question.english: What colors does the Dominican Republic flag have?

options.spanish: Azul, rojo y blanco con escudo en el centro
options.english: Blue, red and white with coat of arms in the center

correctAnswer.spanish: Azul, rojo y blanco con escudo en el centro
correctAnswer.english: Blue, red and white with coat of arms in the center

question.english: In what year was the current Constitution of the Dominican Republic promulgated?

question.spanish: ¿Con qué país comparte la República Dominicana la isla La Española?
question.english: With what country does the Dominican Republic share the island of Hispaniola?

question.spanish: ¿Cómo se llama el Congreso dominicano?
question.english: What is the Dominican Congress called?

options.spanish: Congreso Nacional (bicameral: Senado y Cámara de Diputados)
options.english: National Congress (bicameral: Senate and Chamber of Deputies)

correctAnswer.spanish: Congreso Nacional (bicameral: Senado y Cámara de Diputados)
correctAnswer.english: National Congress (bicameral: Senate and Chamber of Deputies)

question.spanish: ¿Cuál es el himno nacional de la República Dominicana?
question.english: What is the national anthem of the Dominican Republic?

question.english: Who were the Fathers of the Dominican Nation?

options.spanish: Juan Pablo Duarte, Matías Ramón Mella y Francisco del Rosario Sánchez
options.english: Juan Pablo Duarte, Matías Ramón Mella and Francisco del Rosario Sánchez

correctAnswer.spanish: Juan Pablo Duarte, Matías Ramón Mella y Francisco del Rosario Sánchez
correctAnswer.english: Juan Pablo Duarte, Matías Ramón Mella and Francisco del Rosario Sánchez

question.spanish: ¿En qué año se independizó la República Dominicana?
question.english: In what year did the Dominican Republic gain independence?

question.english: What musical genre originates from the Dominican Republic?

question.english: What is the most popular sport in the Dominican Republic?

question.english: What ocean borders the coasts of the Dominican Republic?

question.english: What is the highest peak in the Dominican Republic and the Caribbean?

question.spanish: ¿Qué significa 'Quisqueya'?
question.english: What does 'Quisqueya' mean?

options.spanish: Es el nombre taíno de la República Dominicana (significa 'madre de todas las tierras')
options.english: It is the Taino name for the Dominican Republic (means 'mother of all lands')

correctAnswer.spanish: Es el nombre taíno de la República Dominicana (significa 'madre de todas las tierras')
correctAnswer.english: It is the Taino name for the Dominican Republic (means 'mother of all lands')

question.spanish: ¿Qué plato es típico de la cocina dominicana?
question.english: What dish is typical of Dominican cuisine?

options.spanish: La bandera dominicana (arroz, habichuelas y carne)
options.english: The Dominican flag (rice, beans and meat)

correctAnswer.spanish: La bandera dominicana (arroz, habichuelas y carne)
correctAnswer.english: The Dominican flag (rice, beans and meat)

question.spanish: ¿Por qué quiere venir a la República Dominicana?
question.english: Why do you want to come to the Dominican Republic?

sampleAnswer.spanish: Quiero venir a la República Dominicana porque es un país caribeño con gente cálida, rica cultura, música vibrante y hermosas playas. Me interesa trabajar en el sector turístico y hotelero, que es muy importante para el país.
sampleAnswer.english: I want to come to the Dominican Republic because it is a Caribbean country with warm people, rich culture, vibrant music and beautiful beaches. I am interested in working in the tourism and hospitality sector, which is very important for the country.

question.spanish: ¿Qué sabe sobre la cultura dominicana?
question.english: What do you know about Dominican culture?

sampleAnswer.spanish: Sé que la República Dominicana es la cuna del merengue y la bachata. También conozco sobre la pasión dominicana por el béisbol y la importancia de la familia en la cultura. Los dominicanos son conocidos por su hospitalidad y alegría.
sampleAnswer.english: I know that the Dominican Republic is the birthplace of merengue and bachata. I also know about the Dominican passion for baseball and the importance of family in the culture. Dominicans are known for their hospitality and joy.

question.spanish: ¿Tiene experiencia en su campo profesional?
question.english: Do you have experience in your professional field?

sampleAnswer.spanish: Sí, tengo diez años de experiencia en gestión hotelera y turismo. He trabajado en resorts de playa y tengo certificaciones en hospitalidad internacional. Me especializo en experiencia del cliente y operaciones de hotel.
sampleAnswer.english: Yes, I have ten years of experience in hotel management and tourism. I have worked in beach resorts and have certifications in international hospitality. I specialize in customer experience and hotel operations.

question.spanish: ¿Dónde planea vivir en la República Dominicana?
question.english: Where do you plan to live in the Dominican Republic?

sampleAnswer.spanish: Estoy considerando vivir en Punta Cana o Santo Domingo. Punta Cana tiene muchas oportunidades en turismo, y Santo Domingo ofrece vida urbana y oportunidades culturales. Prefiero estar cerca de mi trabajo.
sampleAnswer.english: I am considering living in Punta Cana or Santo Domingo. Punta Cana has many opportunities in tourism, and Santo Domingo offers urban life and cultural opportunities. I prefer to be close to my work.

question.spanish: ¿Cómo piensa contribuir a la sociedad dominicana?
question.english: How do you plan to contribute to Dominican society?

sampleAnswer.spanish: Planeo contribuir compartiendo mi experiencia en gestión hotelera, ayudando a mejorar los estándares de servicio y capacitando al personal local. También quiero participar en proyectos de turismo sostenible que beneficien a las comunidades locales.
sampleAnswer.english: I plan to contribute by sharing my experience in hotel management, helping to improve service standards and training local staff. I also want to participate in sustainable tourism projects that benefit local communities.

title.spanish: República Dominicana Amplía Infraestructura Turística en Zonas Costeras
title.english: Dominican Republic Expands Tourism Infrastructure in Coastal Areas

content.spanish: El Ministerio de Turismo anunció una inversión de $500 millones para mejorar la infraestructura turística.
content.english: The Ministry of Tourism announced an investment of $500 million to improve tourism infrastructure.

content.spanish: El proyecto incluye la construcción de nuevos hoteles, mejoras en carreteras y aeropuertos regionales.
content.english: The project includes the construction of new hotels, improvements to roads and regional airports.

content.spanish: Se espera que genere más de 15,000 empleos directos e indirectos en el sector turístico.
content.english: It is expected to generate more than 15,000 direct and indirect jobs in the tourism sector.

content.spanish: Las zonas de Samaná, Puerto Plata y Barahona recibirán la mayor parte de la inversión.
content.english: The areas of Samaná, Puerto Plata and Barahona will receive the majority of the investment.

content.spanish: El gobierno busca diversificar la oferta turística más allá de Punta Cana.
content.english: The government seeks to diversify the tourism offering beyond Punta Cana.

content.spanish: También se incluyen programas de capacitación para trabajadores del sector hotelero.
content.english: Training programs for hotel sector workers are also included.

content.spanish: La República Dominicana recibe más de 7 millones de turistas internacionales al año.
content.english: The Dominican Republic receives more than 7 million international tourists per year.

content.spanish: El turismo representa aproximadamente el 17% del PIB del país.
content.english: Tourism represents approximately 17% of the country's GDP.

question.spanish: ¿Cuánto dinero invertirá el gobierno en turismo?
question.english: How much money will the government invest in tourism?

answer.spanish: El gobierno invertirá $500 millones para mejorar la infraestructura turística.
answer.english: The government will invest $500 million to improve tourism infrastructure.

question.spanish: ¿Cuántos empleos se espera generar?
question.english: How many jobs are expected to be generated?

answer.spanish: Se espera generar más de 15,000 empleos directos e indirectos.
answer.english: It is expected to generate more than 15,000 direct and indirect jobs.

question.spanish: ¿Qué porcentaje del PIB representa el turismo?
question.english: What percentage of GDP does tourism represent?

answer.spanish: El turismo representa aproximadamente el 17% del PIB del país.
answer.english: Tourism represents approximately 17% of the country's GDP.
